homepage.subtitle: The ultimate bot solution for enhancing your Travian strategy experience.

features.buildingDescription: Upgrade your buildings automatically based on the most effective strategies to maximize efficiency.

faqSubtitle: Below are some common questions about our Travian bot. If you have more queries, feel free to contact our support team.

faq.a1: The Travian bot automates key processes in the Travian strategy game, such as resource management, construction, and military operations. Itâ€™s designed to help you save time and improve efficiency.
faq.q2: 2. What features does the bot offer?
faq.a2: The bot includes features like automated resource management, smart building automation, troop training, event scheduling (festivals), attack and defense management, real-time notifications, resource transfer and trading automation, strategic farming and attack planning, and online status monitoring.
faq.q3: 3. How do I install and use the bot?
faq.a3: To get started, simply download the bot from our website and follow the installation instructions. Once installed, configure your settings through the intuitive dashboard to automate various tasks in your game.
faq.q4: 4. Are there subscription plans for the bot?
faq.a4: Yes, we offer different subscription plans. Check out our pricing section for details on the Basic, Standard, and Premium plans that suit different needs and budgets.
faq.a5: We prioritize your safety. The bot is regularly updated to comply with the latest game rules, and we implement strong data protection measures to ensure your information remains secure.
